tweet_text:
It was filed by the ACLU of Ohio on behalf of the League of Women Voters of Ohio. 

The commission approved the new maps last week in a 5-2 party-line vote. It's likely going to get a chance to redraw new congressional maps if the state legislature misses its Sept. 30 deadline.
text_en: It was filed by the ACLU of Ohio on behalf of the League of Women Voters of Ohio. The commission approved the new maps last week in a -2 party-line vote. It's likely going to get a chance to redraw new congressional maps if the state legislature misses its Sept. deadline.
